title-group.article-title: Earn Continuing Education Credit for Reading Articles in The Counseling Psychologist!

permissions.copyright-holder: Division of Counseling Psychology of the American Psychological Association

body.p: The Society of Counseling Psychology (Division 17) and American Psychological Association Office of Continuing Education in Psychology (CEP) have partnered to offer an exciting benefit for readers of The Counseling Psychologist (TCP). You can earn CE credits for reading selected articles in each issue of TCP. Each issue of TCP will have a CE article designated by the Division 17 logo (Ψ) carrying a stipulated number of CE credits. Readers may purchase, complete, and submit their CE quiz online in the convenience of your own homes or offices for an affordable fee. Quizzes are scored instantly and CE certificates are available immediately for printing (75% or higher correct score earns credit).

This program has been reviewed and approved by the APA CEP Office to offer Continuing Education (CE) credit o psychologists. The APA CEP Office maintains responsibility for the content of the program.
